elements.text:
HDSA Support Group: Find an HD support group near you through HDSA. Click the box that says HDSA Support Groups and enter your location and preferred distance to find a group. https://hdsa.org/about-hdsa/locate-resources/

PFLAG Local Chapter: Find a local chapter through PFLAG, an organization devoted to LGBTQ+ people and their families. Search for a chapter by entering your zip code or state. https://pflag.org/get-support/
